subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After an off-season of hard choices and hard feelings, Richard Petty Motorsports opened the season with three drivers placing in the top 10 at Daytona.
snippet: After an off-season of hard choices and hard feelings, Richard Petty Motorsports opened the season with three drivers placing in the top 10 at Daytona.
